tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_schedule (
  employee_id INT,
  schedule_date DATE,
  shift_start_time TIME,
  shift_end_time TIME,
  performance_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  position VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE schedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE tasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  employee_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE performance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  date DATE,
  rating INT,
  feedback TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE Employee ( employee_id INT, name STRING, department STRING, position STRING, schedule STRING );
CREATE TABLE Schedule ( schedule_id INT, start_time TIMESTAMP, end_time TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE Performance ( performance_id INT, employee_id INT, performance_score INT, feedback STRING );
CREATE TABLE Department ( department_id INT, department_name STRING, manager_id INT );
CREATE TABLE Manager ( manager_id INT, name STRING, email STRING );
